department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 教學目標：隨著憲法訴訟法2019年初公布，2022年實施，如何藉由過去經驗的反省，檢視憲法訴訟法的基本程序問題（專題第一部份），以及司法院大法官在許宗力法庭面對的當代問題，成為本研究反省憲法與政治關係的重要課題
goal.en:
"Seminar on law and politics
After lifting the martial law, Taiwan established a constitutional democratic system with the third wave of democratization in the world. However, within the liberal democracy camp, how the relationship between the constitution and politics is constructed, varies from countries. In particular, the constitutional review system divides between the United States and the European Union. With the publication of the Constitutional Procedure Law in early 2019 and the prospective taking effect in 2022, the contemporary task is to examine the structure of the Constitutional Procedure Law (the second part of the topic) through international experience (the first part of the topic) and the reflection of the country's practice."

outline.ch:

（二）中華民國臺灣修憲的界線：釋字499

2.修憲公投應否訂入公投法？

1）臺北高等行政法院判決 97年度訴字第2031號
2) 第四屆和第七屆立法委員席次分配方法

（十）核四停建與立法院監督：釋字520

3.廖元豪，台灣法學雜誌233期，2013年10月1日
4.蘇彥圖，台灣法學雜誌233期，2013年10月1日
outline.en:
(1) Democratization in Taiwan, R.O.C.: Interpretation Nr. 261
(2) The Boundaries of Constitutional Amendment in Taiwan, R.O.C.: Interpretation Nr. 499
(3) Constitutional Amendment and Referendum
(4) One person, one vote, one vote, equal value? Interpretation Nr. 721

(8) The President's Emergency Power: Interpretation Nr. 543
(9) Whether the Vice President can also serve as the Premier of the Executive Yuan: Interpretation Nr. 419
(10) The suspension of the construction of the nuclear power plant and the supervision of the Legislative Yuan: Interpretation Nr. 520
(11) No-confidence Motion Proposed during the Extraordinary Session: Interpretation No. 735
(12) The power of investigation of the Legislative Yuan: Interpretation Nr. 585
(13) The Control Yuan and the National Human Rights Commission

(15) Party politics and the Representative of the nationwide constituency

textbook.ch: 指定教科書及參考書： 如大綱所載

gradMethod.ch: 評量及成績計算方式:第一部份由老師與同學共同閱讀文獻，外文部分由老師導讀，中文部分由同學分析報告。第二部分則由同學選定議題，撰寫報告，若有兩位以上選定相同議題，則應分為正、反雙方報告。
gradMethod.en: In Part one the course participants shall be required in turn to analyze the  articles listed. In Part two the course participants shall choose one case or topic to present his analysis.

officeHour.ch: 星期二九點到12點；三點到五點；星期四12點到1點。

flexDiscription.ch: 專題研究注重議題分析、資料蒐集、意見整合與判斷
flexDiscription.en: This seminar focuses on issue analysis, data collection, opinions integration and judgment.

ch.competencies: 具備法政專業研究能力
具備掌握法政整合與時勢脈動的視野
具備社會人文關懷的精神
